document.docAuthor: XUE, XIAO-FENG, WANG, ZHEN, SONG, ZI-WEI & HONG, XIAO-YUE
document.docTitle: Fagaceae XUE, WANG, SONG & HONG, 2009, gen. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Eriophyoid mites on Fagaceae with descriptions of seven new genera and eleven new species (Acari: Eriophyoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Eriophyoid mites on Fagaceae with descriptions of seven new genera and eleven new species (Acari: Eriophyoidea)

heading.emphasis: Key to eriophyoid mite genera on Fagaceae

subSubSection.paragraph: The number of described species from Fagaceae is in brackets after each genus name.

paragraph.keyLead: 3 Gnathosoma small in comparison to body, chelicerae straight or slightly curved................................. Eriophyidae ...4
- Gnathosoma large in comparison to body, chelicerae abruptly curved and bent down near base. Diptilomiopidae ...51
